citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:13pm on
31-AUG-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at facility, knocked on door at residence, honked the GOV horn, and called the number on file.
ACI Bartels received a return call from a licensee stating they are not available and do not have an alternative
authorized person.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:13pm on
31-AUG-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at facility, knocked on door at residence, honked the GOV horn, and called the number on file. 
ACI Bartels received a return call from a licensee stating they are not available and do not have an alternative
authorized person.
